text: Luther is a 1965 movie about the life of Martin Luther. The movie starred Alec McCowen as Luther. == Plot == The movie is a version of John Osborne's biographical play, presenting the life of Martin Luther. ==Related pages== * Luther film == Other websites == * Category:1965 movies Category:Movies about Martin Luther Category:1960s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Guy Green
title: Luther (1965 movie)
